mapper.update:
UPDATE shoot_rank SET
shoot_rank.PlayerId = #{ playerId },
shoot_rank.PlayerName = #{ playerName },
shoot_rank.PlayerEnglishName = #{ playerEnglishName },
shoot_rank.Country = #{ country },
shoot_rank.NativePlace = #{ nativePlace },
shoot_rank.Birth = #{ birth },
shoot_rank.Goals = #{ goals },
shoot_rank.PreRanking = #{ preRanking },
shoot_rank.Ranking = #{ ranking },
shoot_rank.Year = #{ year },
shoot_rank.EndYear = #{ endYear },
shoot_rank.ClubId = #{ clubId },
shoot_rank.ClubName = #{ clubName },
shoot_rank.ClubEnglishName = #{ clubEnglishName },
shoot_rank.ClubFullName = #{ clubFullName },
shoot_rank.ClubEnglishFullName = #{ clubEnglishFullName },
shoot_rank.ClubLogo = #{ clubLogo }
WHERE id= #{id}
